languages.text: "Скажешь, если бы молили, не жег бы? Они — паразиты. Заткнись и жги".

traits.locale_text: "Скажешь, если бы молили не жег бы? Они — паразиты. Заткнись и жги".

languages.text: "You think I wouldn't if they begged me? They're vermin. Shut up and burn 'em."
languages.original_text: "Скажешь, если бы молили, не жег бы? Они — паразиты. Заткнись и жги".

traits.locale_text: "You mean I wouldn't if they begged me for mercy? They're vermin. Shut up and burn 'em."
"You mean I wouldn't if they begged me for mercy? They're vermin. Shut up and burn 'em."
"You think I wouldn't if they begged me? They're vermin. Shut up and burn 'em."
"You think I wouldn't if they begged me? They're vermin. Shut up and burn 'em."
"You think I wouldn't if they begged me? They're vermin. Shut up and burn 'em."
"You think I wouldn't if they begged me? They're vermin. Shut up and burn 'em."

languages.text: “你以为老鼠求饶，我就不会烧死它们吗？都是渣滓，赶紧闭嘴，统统烧死就是了。”
languages.original_text: "You think I wouldn't if they begged me? They're vermin. Shut up and burn 'em."

traits.locale_text: “你以为老鼠求饶，我就不会烧死它们吗？都是渣滓，赶紧闭嘴，统统烧死就是了。”

languages.text: 「命乞いをされたら、俺は殺さないとでも？あいつらは害虫だ。黙って燃やせ」
languages.original_text: "You think I wouldn't if they begged me? They're vermin. Shut up and burn 'em."

traits.locale_text: 「命乞いをされたら、俺は殺さないとでも？あいつらは害虫だ。黙って燃やせ」

languages.text: «¿Crees que no lo haría si me suplicaran? Son alimañas. Calla y quémalos».
languages.original_text: "You think I wouldn't if they begged me? They're vermin. Shut up and burn 'em."

traits.locale_text: «¿Crees que no lo haría si me suplicaran? Son alimañas. Calla y quémalos».

languages.text: "Glaubt Ihr, ich würde es nicht machen, wenn sie winseln würden? Die sind Ungeziefer. Haltet die Fresse und verbrennt sie."
languages.original_text: "You think I wouldn't if they begged me? They're vermin. Shut up and burn 'em."

traits.locale_text: "Glaubt Ihr, ich würde es nicht machen, wenn sie winseln würden? Die sind Ungeziefer. Haltet die Fresse und verbrennt sie."

languages.text: « Tu crois vraiment que ça m'empêcherait de le faire ? Ça reste de la vermine. Alors ferme-la et contente-toi de faire ton boulot. »
languages.original_text: "You think I wouldn't if they begged me? They're vermin. Shut up and burn 'em."

traits.locale_text: « Tu crois vraiment que ça m'empêcherait de le faire ? Ça reste de la vermine. Alors ferme-la et contente-toi de faire ton boulot. »

languages.text: "Bana yalvarsalardı bunu yapmaz mıydım sence? Onlar haşere. Şimdi sus ve yak onları."
languages.original_text: "You think I wouldn't if they begged me? They're vermin. Shut up and burn 'em."

traits.locale_text: "Bana yalvarsalardı bunu yapmaz mıydım sence? Onlar haşere. Kapa çeneni ve yak onları."
